title: The Lighthouse Keeper's Daughter
description: In this reprint of a popular children's book, a young girl named Miranda learns about life on a remote island in Maine. When her father, the lighthhouse keeper, is kept away from the island by a storm, Miranda takes the responsibility to keep the light shining through the storm. Based on actual circumstances, the story is beautifully illustrated with watercolor paintings.
author: Arielle North Olson
